content.rendered:
Service Menu

We enhance individial beauty with state-of-the-art technologies and personalized service. Our professional team is ready to provide the greatest service you’ve ever had.

  • Nails
  • Waxing
  • Lashes
  • Facials

Nails

Get your nails done for great mood. Simple pleasures can make your week, not just day.

Classic Manicure $25

    - Add Shellac                             +$10

    - Remove existing Shellac               +$10

Delicate cuticle work, buffing, and shaping. To finish, a relaxing hand massage with cuticle oil treatment and a hot towel, topped off with the perfect paint. (40 min)

Deluxe Manicure $38

    - Add Shellac                             +$7

    - Remove existing Shellac               +$10

If you want a more premium service. Our classic manicure – with an additional hand scrub and mask, add optional Shellac for a more longer-lasting look. (60 min)

Classic Pedicure $35

    - Add Shellac                             +$15

    - Remove existing Shellac               +$10

Our popular pedi – soak your feet in salt /w lemon or orange, have you feet scrubbed with sugar and callouses treated with care. This is followed by a massage and hot towel. (40 min)

Deluxe Pedicure $60

    - Add Shellac                             +$10

    - Remove existing Shellac               +$10

Our popular pedi with a premium twist– soak your feet in salt /w lemon or orange, have you feet scrubbed with sugar and callouses treated with care. This is followed by a massage and hot towel. (40 min)

Signature Jelly Pedicure $70

    - Add Shellac                             +$10

    - Remove existing Shellac               +$10

Treat yourself with this premium Instagram ready experience - our Classic Pedi done in our special Jelly treatment. Also includes a hot-stone massage and Paraffin treatment to moisturize your skin. (60 min)

Extra Services

Nail Art                                     $15+
Shellac polish change                  $20+
Regular polish change                  $15
Add on French                         $10-15+
Paraffin Treatment Hand/Feet         $15+
10 mins extra massage                  $15

Remove
  Shellac  $10
  Extension Nails  $20

Combo Package

Classic Mani - Classic Pedi               $55

Gel Mani - Classic Pedi                    $65

Classic Mani - Gel Pedi                    $65

Gel Mani - Gel Pedi                         $80

(90 min)

Nail Extensions

                        Full set                  Fill
Dipping powder  $55+       

Acrylic

  Short               $50+                   $45+

  Medium            $55+                 $50+

  Long                $65+                  $60+

  Extra Long         $75+                 $65+

Colour powder 

  Short               $65

  Medium            $70

  Long                $80

  Ombre             $80+

Bio Gel

  Short               $65+                   $50+

  Medium            $70+                 $55+

  Long                $75+                  $60+

Overlay              $60

Add manicure                                $10

Remove Shellac                              $10

Remove Extensions                          $15

Book Appointment

Waxing

General

Eye brow                                       $15
Eye Tinting                                     $15
Lip                                        $10
Chin                                              $10
Full Face                                       $30+
Under Arm                                    $15+
Half / Full Arm                     $20+ / $30+
Half / Full Leg                      $25+ / $40+
Chest                                           $30+
Back                                            $35+

Full Body $120
Bikini $25+
Brazillian $45+
Book Appointment

Lashes

Lashes can change it all. Try out styling and tinting your Lashes and see the difference. (180 min)

Classic $90

     - Fill                                      $60

 

This is the best option for a more natural look with a darker and curled look. (120 min)

Lash Remover $20
Wispy $120+

     - Fill                                      $65

For those who want to be more adventurous. (140 min)

Lash Lift and Tint $80
Volume $130+

     - Fill                                      $75

Great for that darker look and to stand out in a crowd. (180 min)

Lash Lifting $70
Mega Volume $140+

     - Fill                                      $80

Our highest volume option for when you want to walk down a runway. (180 min)

Book Appointment

Facials

Indulge a little longer with a customized facial to help achieve your skin goals in 60-90 minutes.

Quickie Facial $45

Deep clean your face through steaming with fresh herbs to relax and exfoliate your skin. Finished with a carefully selected face mask to refresh your skin. (40 min)

Signature Glow Facial $70

Customized special facial to revive stressed, dehydrated and overwhelmed skin. Followed up with our deep cleansing routine and finished with a customized Jelly mask under therapeutic LED lighting to bring back your skin's youthful glow and look. (60 min)

Dermaplaning $100

This facial will help exfoliates your skin and gets rid of dirt and vellus hair. (60 min)

Hydra Facial $130

The hydra facial treats a variety of skin conditions including acne, dryness and wrinkles. This facial will help improve overall skin texture, tone, and appearance. (60 min)

Book Appointment

Frequently Asked Questions

Here you can find answers on frequently asked questions. If you cannot find the answer, feel free to contact us via email or phone.

Yes! We are currently following guidelines from Toronto Public Health which suggests limiting the number of people in our facilities. In order to better serve you we ask you book online or by calling in. This way we can make sure you have a very clean and safe environment.

There is a 1 hour window to reschedule your appointment before your scheduled time. If you booked online, you would have received an email to reschedule. Otherwise no matter how you have booked, you can call in and speak with us.

We know some services can be long and tedious, we ask that if you do bring in food that you clean up after yourself that way others can enjoy their experience as well!

While you are welcome to use your phone we do have to note that sometimes distractions can lead to unwanted results during the procedure.

Contact

T: 416 901 2230
info@sarangnails.com

Hours

Mon to Fri: 10:00 am — 8:00 pm
Sat: 10:00 am — 7:00 pm
Sun: 10:00 am — 6:00 pm

Location

633A Bloor St W,
Toronto, ON 
M6G1K8
